__e: - Huh, I'm done for, I fear.
Well, Edward, I wonder what the poor people are doing tonight.
Edward, I can't tell you how thrilled I am. I'm as pleased as punch.
That's Mr. Edward's room. He's abroad, of course, but I always keep it ready for him.
For eight years, Brother Edward has been the best of us.
Edward was the name of the other boy.
Thirtyyears, Edward, and you've never noticed one damn thing.
Hello Edward, and thanks for the comment.
This could not have happened at a worse time for me. Or for Edward for that matter.
I think Edward enjoyed his life, what there was of it.
Mary! Uncle Edward has a surprise for us.
Edward needs a sister, and I need ... what shall we call you?
